BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ADT_TRN(STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_VERIFIED_BY_AUDITOR,STR_AUDITED_BY,DT_AUDIT_DATE,STR_REMARKS ,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,GNUM_ISVALID ,GNUM_SEAT_ID,gnum_hospital_code,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) (SELECT T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_VERIFIED_BY_AUDITOR,T.STR_AUDITED_BY,T.DT_AUDIT_DATE,T.STR_REMARKS ,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,T.GNUM_ISVALID ,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.gnum_hospital_code,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_ADT_TRN A where A.STR_CHALLAN_NO=T.STR_CHALLAN_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_ADT_TRN T WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_ADT_TRN T SET T.STR_VERIFIED_BY_AUDITOR=?,T.STR_AUDITED_BY=?,T.DT_AUDIT_DATE=?,T.STR_REMARKS =?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS =? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
